dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Ahaha~ Finally, a moment between us again."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "You’ve been busy playing that cute little rhythm game, I’ve noticed."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "I’m glad you still thought of me even though you seemed pretty occupied."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Now I know it's because you were working so hard to add me to the game and sing with me!"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Hmm, there’s only enough space here for us to sing one song-"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "-and unfortunately since this game doesn’t have microphone support, we can’t exactly “sing” together."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "But that blue haired kid’s vocal data is still stored here, why don’t we just use that for you?"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "I want to sing with you for as long as I can, so expect this to be very, very difficult."
